t: Marc Ecko - Wikipedia
s: 4 weeks ago - Marc Louis Ecko (né Milecofsky; August 29, 1972) is an American fashion designer, entrepreneur, and artist. He is the founder and Chief Creative Officer of fashion company Ecko Unlimited. He also founded Complex magazine in 2002. Milecofsky was born in New Jersey on August 29, 1972.

t: Marc Ecko: How He Built A Billion Dollar Authentic Personal Brand
s: October 1, 2013 - Once a graffiti artist with no connections or fashion pedigree, Marc Eckō left the safety net of pharmacy school to start his own company. Armed only with hustle, sweat equity and creativity, he flipped a $5,000 bag of cash into a global corporation now worth hundreds of millions of dollars.
